name: sodium perborate, tetrahydrate, powder to generic market for bleach | bleach | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28237/documentation

This activity links the output of the market for sodium perborate to the generic market for bleach.

The activity ends with the production sodium perborate for the generic market for bleaches.
